src:
Indonesia Jadi Tuan Rumah, Berikut Harga Tiket Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020
05 Nov 2019, 20:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 akan bertindak sebagai tuan rumah Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Ajang dua tahunan tersebut bakal berlangsung pada 6-10 November 2019.
Ada dua venue yang akan digunakan untuk menggelar kejuaraan tersebut yaitu Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, dan Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno (SUGBK), Senayan, Jakarta. PSSI pun telah merilis harga tiket pertandingan.
Untuk laga yang berlangsung di Stadion Madya, harga tiket yang dibanderol yaitu Rp 75 ribu (tribun barat dan timur). Sementara untuk pertandingan yang digelar di SUGBK ada tiga kategori yang dijual yakni utara dan selatan Rp 75 ribu, kategori 1 timur Rp 100 ribu, dan VIP Barat Rp 150 ribu.
Semua tiket tersebut hanya bisa dibeli secara online. Yaitu melalui website pssi.org.
Sementara itu selain diisi Timnas Indonesia U-19, Grup K juga dihuni oleh Timor Leste, Hong Kong, dan Korea Utara. Pada laga perdana, Garuda Asia akan menghadapi Timor Leste di Stadion Madya, Rabu (6/11).
Dua hari berselang, Timnas Indonesia U-19 akan bersua Hong Kong di Stadion Madya. Kemudian pada laga pamungkas, pasukan Fakhri Husaini itu bakal berhadapan dengan Korea Utara di SUGBK, Minggu (10/11).

text:
Indonesia Becomes the Host, Here are the Ticket Prices for the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup
05 Nov 2019, 20:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesia U-19 national team will act as the host of Group K of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup. The biennial event will take place on 6-10 November 2019.
There are two venues that will be used to hold the championship, namely Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, and the Bung Karno Main Stadium (SUGBK), Senayan, Jakarta. PSSI has also released the price of match tickets.
For the match that took place at the Madya Stadium, the price of the ticket is priced at Rp. 75 thousand (west and east stands). Meanwhile, for the matches held at SUGBK, three categories were sold, namely Rp. 75 thousand north and south, category 1 east Rp. 100,000, and West VIP Rp. 150 thousand.
All tickets can only be purchased online. Namely through the website pssi.org.
Meanwhile, besides being filled with the Indonesian National Team U-19, Group K is also inhabited by Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and North Korea. In the inaugural match, Garuda Asia will face East Timor at the Madya Stadium on Wednesday (6/11).
Two days later, the Indonesian U-19 national team will meet Hong Kong at the Madya Stadium. Then in the final match, Fakhri Husaini's troops will face North Korea at SUGBK on Sunday (11/10).
